
## Froude Number Channel

```{r froude-number-channel, echo = FALSE}
# expects parameters file1, file2, type1, type2
fnc1 = read_fnc(file1, type1)
fnc2 = read_fnc(file2, type2)
fnc.diff = diff_fnc(fnc1, fnc2)
fnc.rmse.station = rmse_fnc(fnc.diff, "Station")
fnc.rmse.time = rmse_fnc(fnc.diff, "Time")

fnc.diff %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Station, y = diff_fnc) + geom_boxplot() +
  ylab("Difference") +
  ggtitle("Froude Number Channel Differences at Stations")
fnc.rmse.station %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Station, y = rmse_fnc) +
  geom_col() + ylab("RMSE") +
  ggtitle("Froude Number Channel RMSE at Stations")
fnc.rmse.time %>% mutate(Time = as.POSIXct(Time, format = "%d%b%Y %M:%S",
    tz = "UTC")) %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Time, y = rmse_fnc) + geom_line() +
  scale_x_datetime(date_labels = "%b %Y") + 
  ylab("RMSE") +
  ggtitle("Froude Number Channel RMSE Through Time")
```
